de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.phone

Class PhoneArithmetics

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.phone.PhoneArithmetics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Arithmetics

    public class PhoneArithmetics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Arithmetics
    Provides methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's children, when using the smartphone layout.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.Arithmetics

        Arithmetics.Axis

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhoneArithmetics(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
      Creates a new class, which provides methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's children.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhoneArithmetics

        public PhoneArithmetics(@NonNull
                        TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
        Creates a new class, which provides methods, which allow to calculate the position, size and rotation of a TabSwitcher's children.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The tab switcher, the arithmetics should be calculated for, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null

                               Arithmetics.Axis axis,
                               @NonNull
                               android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Returns the position of a motion event on a specific axis.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis as a value of the enum Arithmetics.Axis. The axis may not be null
        event - The motion event, whose position should be returned, as an instance of the class MotionEvent. The motion event may not be null
        Returns:
        The position of the given motion event on the given axis as a Float value

                                  android.view.View view,

        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Animates the position of a view on a specific axis.
        Specified by:
        animatePosition in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis as a value of the enum Arithmetics.Axis. The axis may not be null
        animator - The animator, which should be used to animate the position, as an instance of the class ViewPropertyAnimator. The animator may not be null
        view - The view, whose position should be animated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        position - The position, which should be set by the animation, as a Float value
        includePadding - True, if the view's padding should be taken into account, false otherwise

      • getPadding

        public final int getPadding(@NonNull
                            Arithmetics.Axis axis,
                            int gravity,
                            @NonNull
                            android.view.View view)
        Description copied from interface: Arithmetics
        Returns the padding of a view on a specific axis and using a specific gravity.
        Specified by:
        getPadding in interface Arithmetics
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis as a value of the enum Arithmetics.Axis. The axis may not be null
        gravity - The gravity as an Integer value. The gravity must be Gravity.START or Gravity.END
        view - The view, whose padding should be returned, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        Returns:
        The padding of the given view on the given axis and using the given gravity as an Integer value
